verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou men <S%H582><s%>, that they may search <S%H8446><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, which I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: of every <S%H376><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> shall ye send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a man <S%H259><s%>, every one a ruler <S%H5387><s%> among them.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> by the Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran <S%H6290><s%>: all those men <S%H582><s%> were <S%H1992><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
And these were their names <S%H8034><s%>: of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, Shammua <S%H8051><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zaccur <S%H2139><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>, Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hori <S%H2753><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, Kalev <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Y'funeh <S%H3312><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%>, Igal <S%H3008><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, Oshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, Palti <S%H6406><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Raphu <S%H7505><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%>, Gaddiel <S%H1427><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Sodi <S%H5476><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, namely, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, Gaddi <S%H1426><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Susi <S%H5485><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, Ammiel <S%H5988><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gemalli <S%H1582><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, SHetur <S%H5639><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mikha'el <S%H4317><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naftali <S%H5321><s%>, Nahbi <S%H5147><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Vophsi <S%H2058><s%>.
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, Geuel <S%H1345><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machi <S%H4352><s%>.

These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to spy out <S%H8446><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>. And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Oshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> Jehoshua <S%H3091><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them to spy out <S%H8446><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Get you up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> this way southward <S%H5045><s%>, and go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into the mountain <S%H2022><s%>:

And see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, what it is; and the people <S%H5971><s%> that dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> therein, whether they be strong <S%H2389><s%> or weak <S%H7504><s%>, few <S%H4592><s%> or many <S%H7227><s%>;

And what the land <S%H776><s%> is that they dwell in <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, whether it be good <S%H2896><s%> or bad <S%H7451><s%>; and what cities <S%H5892><s%> they be that they dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in <S%H2007><s%>, whether in tents <S%H4264><s%>, or in strong holds <S%H4013><s%>;

And what the land <S%H776><s%> is, whether it be fat <S%H8082><s%> or lean <S%H7330><s%>, whether there be <S%H3426><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> therein, or not. And be ye of good courage <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8694><s%>, and bring <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>. Now the time <S%H3117><s%> was the time <S%H3117><s%> of the firstripe <S%H1061><s%> grapes <S%H6025><s%>.

So they went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and searched <S%H8446><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> unto Rehob <S%H7340><s%>, as men come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to Hamath <S%H2574><s%>.

And they ascended <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the south <S%H5045><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Hevron <S%H2275><s%>; where Ahiman <S%H289><s%>, Sheshai <S%H8344><s%>, and Talmai <S%H8526><s%>, the children <S%H3211><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%>, were. (Now Hevron <S%H2275><s%> was built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8738><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Zoan <S%H6814><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.)

And they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol <S%H812><s%>, and cut down <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from thence a branch <S%H2156><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> cluster <S%H811><s%> of grapes <S%H6025><s%>, and they bare <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it between two <S%H8147><s%> upon a staff <S%H4132><s%>; and they brought of the pomegranates <S%H7416><s%>, and of the figs <S%H8384><s%>.

The place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Eshcol <S%H812><s%>, because of <S%H182><s%> the cluster of grapes <S%H811><s%> which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> cut down <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from thence.
And they returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from searching <S%H8446><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> after <S%H7093><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And they went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, and to Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and to all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, unto the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran <S%H6290><s%>, to Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>; and brought back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> unto them, and unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, and shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

And they told <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, We came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> whither thou sentest <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> us, and surely it floweth <S%H2100><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>; and this is the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of it.

Nevertheless <S%H657><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> be strong <S%H5794><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, and the cities <S%H5892><s%> are walled <S%H1219><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, and very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%>: and moreover we saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the children <S%H3211><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%> there.

The Amalekites <S%H6002><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%>: and the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and the Y'vusis <S%H2983><s%>, and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the mountains <S%H2022><s%>: and the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and by the coast <S%H3027><s%> of Yarden <S%H3383><s%>.

And Kalev <S%H3612><s%> stilled <S%H2013><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> before Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let us go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at once <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it; for we are well able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to overcome <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

But the men <S%H582><s%> that went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with him said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, We be not able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> against the people <S%H5971><s%>; for they are stronger <S%H2389><s%> than we.

And they brought up <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> an evil report <S%H1681><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> which they had searched <S%H8446><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, The land <S%H776><s%>, through which we have gone <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to search <S%H8446><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it, is a land <S%H776><s%> that eateth up <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thereof; and all the people <S%H5971><s%> that we saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in it <S%H8432><s%> are men <S%H582><s%> of a great stature <S%H4060><s%>.

And there we saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the giants <S%H5303><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%>, which come of the giants <S%H5303><s%>: and we were in our own sight <S%H5869><s%> as grasshoppers <S%H2284><s%>, and so we were in their sight <S%H5869><s%>.
